title: Team Definition Schema
description: JSON schema for team definition files in the dream-team application

id.description: Unique identifier for the team (can be numeric string or UUID)

team_id.description: Team identifier, usually in format 'team-{id}' or UUID

protected.description: Whether the team is protected from deletion/modification

created.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the team was created

created_by.description: User or system that created the team

agents.description: Array of agents that belong to this team

input_key.description: Unique key for the agent input

model_name.description: Name of the model for this agent

use_mcp.description: Allow agent to use MCP server

use_bing_grounding.description: Allow agent to search the web with bing

system_message.description: System message or prompt for the agent

icon.description: Icon identifier for the agent (e.g., Terminal, Globe, File)

index_name.description: Name of the index for RAG agents or knowledge base reference

description.description: Detailed description of the team's purpose and capabilities

logo.description: Icon identifier for the team logo

plan.description: Plan or strategy description for the team

starting_tasks.description: Array of predefined tasks that can be started with this team

prompt.description: The prompt or instruction for the task

created.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the task was created

creator.description: User or system that created the task
